verses.text: \w Make|strong="H2142"\w* haste, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w to|strong="H1732"\w* deliver \w me|strong="H2142"\w*! Hurry, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H1732"\w* help \w me|strong="H2142"\w*!

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w my|strong="H3068"\w* life \w be|strong="H3068"\w* ashamed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* confounded; \w may|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* wish \w me|strong="H5337"\w* harm \w be|strong="H3068"\w* repelled \w and|strong="H3068"\w* humiliated.
\w May|strong="H5315"\w* \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* say, “Aha, aha!” retreat because \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* \w shame|strong="H3637"\w*.

\w May|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* who seek \w You|strong="H5921"\w* rejoice \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* glad \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w*; \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* who love \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* salvation always \w say|strong="H7725"\w*, “\w Let|strong="H7725"\w* God \w be|strong="H7725"\w* magnified!”

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3605"\w* am poor \w and|strong="H8055"\w* needy; hurry \w to|strong="H1245"\w* \w me|strong="H1245"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1245"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w help|strong="H3444"\w* \w and|strong="H8055"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w deliverer|strong="H3444"\w*; \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w do|strong="H3605"\w* not delay.
